title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.17 - Expenditure of funds after cessation of games of chance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.17 - Expenditure of funds after cessation of games of chance

State Regulations

An organization that has ceased to conduct games of
chance for any reason, and has unexpended games of chance funds, shall: (a) disburse said funds for lawful purposes
within a period of one year after the cessation of the conduct of games of
chance; or
(b) disburse said funds
in accordance with a plan of expenditure approved in advance by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4624.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
